  Manages SFTP daemon (sftpd) configuration on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance should exist per router. SFTPD requires SSHD to be enabled for the service to work.

# rtx_sftpd (Resource)

Manages SFTP daemon (sftpd) configuration on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance should exist per router. SFTPD requires SSHD to be enabled for the service to work.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hosts` (List of String) List of interfaces to listen on. At least one interface must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
